text: @GavinBarwell We are not "a few weeks into a crisis" . The gov't have had since late January 2020 to recognise that one of the biggest threats to our lives and economy was heading our way. #borisjohnson was too idle to attend Cobra meetings &  #Matthancock was out of his depth  #COVID19

entity.name: Hunt and Johnson's final public debate
entity.description: The Conservative leadership hopefuls are being grilled by readers of The Sun newspaper. It is the pair's last chance to debate each other in front of the general public before polls close. One of the two candidates will be named the prime minister of the UK within the next week.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
